item.description:
TMIRCE's been assigned 2 transition areas for the Spring Reach the Beach Relay and we need your help. There are a ton of awesome jobs during this 6-8ish hour stint of work and an awesome volunteer t-shirt that only the volunteers get.

It's a serious honor to have and wear. If you think you have what it takes to be super awesome, click the volunteer button right here, then:   https://ma.rtbrelay.com/reg_volunteer.php

We still need volunteers to step up and knock it out of the park for Friday, MAY 20th in the AM. I know it's tough to ask people to take off work, so I will offer to take those who volunteer out for a night of bowling or dinner to say thanks. Interest peeked? Check out the instructions below.

Instructions:   -From the  website  -select Informal Running - TMIRCE from the drop down menu. Fill out the info and your in. 

Thanks to everyone who's already signed up and tell your friends about Reach the Beach. It's the greatest time volunteering ever. Andy
item.how_to_find_us: Contact Andy Marx directly to find out to which Transition Area you are assigned
item.why: Learn how a relay race works, by helping to facilitate it! Support the informal gatherings by helping Reach The Beach (who donated a lot to TMIRCE). Hang a blast working alongside other runners!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Volunteer with TMIRCE at Reach The Beach Spring!
